references.paper_title: Mastering the game of go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This work demonstrated the power of reinforcement learning, which is mentioned as a promising, but not fully explored, technique in the surveyed paper.

references.paper_title: CARLA: An open urban driving simulator
references.reason: CARLA is a widely used simulation environment for autonomous driving research, and the paper mentions its limitations in providing realistic sensor simulation results, thus motivating the use of 3DGS.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), the core technology used to construct the photorealistic digital replica of the real world in the surveyed paper.
This paper introduces Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO), the reinforcement learning framework used to update the AD policy in the surveyed paper.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This work laid the groundwork for modern deep learning architectures and may be relevant as a base for image encoders used in the surveyed RAD framework.
